name: GetAreaOfInterest
description:
This operation returns a bounding box around the most important area of the image.
A successful response will be returned in JSON. If the request failed, the response contains an error code and a message to help determine what went wrong.
Upon failure, the error code and an error message are returned. The error code could be one of InvalidImageUrl, InvalidImageFormat, InvalidImageSize, NotSupportedImage, FailedToProcess, Timeout, or InternalServerError.

body.description: A JSON document with a URL pointing to the image that is to be analyzed.

$ul: **areaOfInterest**: A bounding box for an area inside an image.
**h**: Height measured from the top-left point of the area, in pixels.
**w**: Width measured from the top-left point of the area, in pixels.
**x**: X-coordinate of the top left point of the area, in pixels.
**y**: Y-coordinate of the top left point of the area, in pixels.
**requestId**: Id of the REST API request.

$block: Details about the API request error.

$ul: **message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
